description: The Institute of Supply Management releases its survey of U.S. factories for the month of May today. In Europe, the latest factory ordering data are indicating modest economic improvement.
title: Factory data suggest economic pick-up
contentencoded:
The Institute of Supply Management releases its survey of U.S. factories for the month of May today. In Europe, the latest factory ordering data are indicating modest economic improvement.

Gus Faucher, senior economist at PNC Financial Services Group, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss his expectations and what's driving growth at Chrysler.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, June 3, 2013
